categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: The Red Brine was an alias used by a male Mon Calamari warrior who served the Ivax Syndicate, in the Anoat sector. A real one-man commando squad, he served the Syndicate to the best of his ability by eliminating enemies with great efficiency.
In the 2015 iOS video game Star Wars: Uprising, the red Brine was one of the many crew members that could be sent on Crew Runs for helpful items.
